channel.title: Comments on: Interview Highlights: “Psst… Sonia Ricotti, you got a second?”

item.title: By: Sabrina Truscott
item.dc:creator: Sabrina Truscott
item.description: Absolutely. We all measure success in different ways. That's why we all get to find our unique path and why, as you said, the first thing to do is define what success means to you. What do YOU want to do? :)
item.content:encoded: Absolutely. We all measure success in different ways. That’s why we all get to find our unique path and why, as you said, the first thing to do is define what success means to you. What do YOU want to do? ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: allisono.1@juno.com
item.dc:creator: allisono.1@juno.com
item.description: I think that success is an individual process. It has different meaning for different individuals. So--the first thing to do would be to define that for yourself. Get that straight, and what ever is the sky for you is the limit--success--the sky after all is limitless!
item.content:encoded:
I think that success is an individual process. It has different meaning for different individuals. So–the first thing to do would be to define that for yourself.
Get that straight, and what ever is the sky for you is the limit–success–the sky after all is limitless!
